body_html: No, other than the disruption to core it looks pretty good. Our long term design goal is to enable a diversity of distributed I/O solutions to be used in a modular fashion with minimal impact on binaries that don't need them. While we're still gaining experience with alternate solutions, we want to keep them in contrib.

body: No, other than the disruption to core it looks pretty good.  Our long term design goal is to enable a diversity of distributed I/O solutions to be used in a modular fashion with minimal impact on binaries that don't need them.  While we're still gaining experience with alternate solutions, we want to keep them in contrib.
